#summary Database Proof of Concept
#labels Phase-Requirements,Phase-Design

= Introduction =

This proof of concept aims to study the Database connector and Database metadata recovery.

= Current Status =

Finished.

= Details =

  * In QSqlDatabase class, use the method tables() to get table names.
  * Use the method record() to get field metadata from QSqlDatabase class.
  * There is no method to get indexes and foreign keys metadata.
   * One solution is to use database specifics SQL
   * Use other database connection classes (use this only if there is no solution to QSqlDatabase).
